ui5lab.wl.img.name: Image library
ui5lab.wl.img.description: A library to view images based on a base64 data uri

imageviewer.name: imageviewer
imageviewer.description: A image viewer Control that will show an image based on a base64 uri. This allows you to show uploaded images immediately instead of uploading it to the server. No need for a static file url anymore.

samples.name: Image Viewer Example
samples.description: Upload a Image and show it immediately as a base 64 data uri
